bwwExcerpt: Samara Caplan and Laura Gauthier, Apt. 613: There is no doubt that Beetlejuice is a fun way to spend an evening. All the elements work together to bring a show full of energy that highlights connection, family, grief and love. Grab your handbook for the recently deceased and get ready to catch the show of a lifetime!
